message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Is that something we can discuss?
I understand your position, Bob, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $10,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $10,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
